sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This script will run once on upgrade to convert UX Macroponent Definitions composition from Dashboard ViewPort to new Dashboard and will update the element_id value in Layout model</description> <name>convert dashboard viewport to new dashbo</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) new global.AdvancedDashboardUtility().convertFromDashboardViewPortToNewDashboard();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-25 14:43:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e4831a4644c70110f87749517784a511</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>convert dashboard viewport to new dashbo</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide PAR Seismic Dashboards" source="com.snc.par.dashboards">659b38643c35311068bcf327dfe37fea</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_e4831a4644c70110f87749517784a511</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 17:59:40</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: convert dashboard viewport to new dashbo
